attributes.action: amend the Equality Bill so that employers are able by law to positively discriminate in favour of white, British men
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Equality Bill, as proposed by Harriet Harman should be modified so that aswell as allowing employers to positively discriminate in favour of women and minority groups, they can positively discriminate in favour of white British men.

Therefore everyone's equal, every decision has legal protection and everyone's a winner.
